name: Black Hole Unity HDRP Demo
description:
BLACK HOLE - UNITY HDRP DEMO

Simulating a black hole using Unity's HDRP (High Definition Render Pipeline)

Note : The version you're about to download is more recent than the one shown in the video. Screen Shots are still accurate !

Materials, lighting and post processing were changed.

CONTROLS

Keyboard and Mouse

  • [z] - [s]- Move forward/backward 
  • [q] - [d] - Strafe right/left
  • [Shift] - Speed Boost
  • [Space] to hop in/out of the spacecraft
  • Mouse to orient the camera
RECOMMENDED SPECS

⚠ Can be GPU Intensive

Nvidia GTX 1050 or higher recommended to run smoothly

SOFTWARE USED
  • Unity 2019.3
  • Maya
